name: Food Website
desc: Welcome to Sri Ramana Home Foods! Our full-stack website lets you explore our sweet menu, learn about us, and get in touch easily.

name: Passenger Counter
desc: A web application to track the number of entries at a train station.

name: Blackjack Game
desc: This is a single-player, browser-based Blackjack game where the player tries to beat the dealer by getting a card sum closer to 21 without going over.

name: Mobile App
desc: This web app enables users to create and manage a shopping list in real-time using Firebase. Add, remove, and edit items seamlessly with just a few clicks.

name: Runway Runners
desc: Designed and developed a user-friendly coin collecting game using UNITY software for fun engagement

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
desc: Tic Tac Toe is a two-player game in which the objective is to take turns and mark the correct spaces in a 3x3 (or larger) grid
